Text: Even though it says "no seeders", it should still seed from my PC, and I will seed this until a good number of people complete it.  Seeding should be starting, as Utorrent completed the recognition.
BTW, the compression was inherent in the source material, as that is how it looked when it played on MGM-HD (so until this comes out on blu-ray, this is as good as it gets).

To open screen caps, copy the page link and open it in a new tab or window. 

For whatever reason, when you click to directly go to ImageShack, it gives you an error message.

What the f**k guys!  When I first posted this, there were @ 80 to 140 people who snatched this.. now there are NO SEEDERS at all?!?  Really?

I'll start seeding this again so the leechers can complete their files.
